cmp: 几 (small table, almost, a few/how many, how much/how many/several/a few)
mng: place, location, spot, point, office, department, bureau, respect, classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside, to live, to dwell, to be in, to be situated at, to stay, to get along with, to be in a position of, to deal with, to discipline, to punish

to be in (some state, position, or condition)
to coexist, to get along (with others)
benefit, advantage, gain, profit, also pr. [hao3 chu4]
